body.p: Born on November 23, 1819 in Belleville, Virginia. Moved to Hannibal, Missouri as a child. Moved to Quincy, Illinois and worked as a rope maker and auctioneer. At the outbreak of the Civil War, Prentiss was put in command of a division. At the battle of Shiloh, Prentiss was captured along with his division by Confederate forces at the Hornet's Nest. Upon being released, he received the rank of Major General. He died on February 8, 1901 in Bethany, Missouri.
